corporation.content: In the vanguard of future industries, we commit to enhancing life's quality with our dedication, quality, and service.

product.title: MSI는 SMT 산업에서 독보적인 기술력으로 우수한 제품을 제공하고 있습니다.

desc: MSI is the trusted name in SMT. Since our founding in 1979,we have put evolvement first.
MSI is creating and providing the future.
In the vanguard of future industries, we commit to enhancing life's quality with our dedication, quality, and service.

items.title: ▶ Customer Satisfaction
items.desc: We grow with customer satisfaction by providing the best products and services.

items.title: ▶ Esteem Human Culture
items.desc: We respect autonomy and creativity with the spirit of human dignity.

major.title: A talented and dedicated crew
major.desc: The MSI crew—the people who serve our clients and steward their assets with dedication, integrity, and passion—are critical to our success.

company.last: MSI, a specialist in SMT technology, is committed to sustainable management practices based on a foundation of trust with our customers and various stakeholders. By systematically responding to rapidly changing global trends, we aim to achieve sustainable growth, thereby fulfilling our corporate social responsibility.

contact.title: Contact us
desc: Thank you for visiting MSI website.
Please send to your inquiry your details along with accurate email information. We will respond as quickly as possible.

service.title: 서비스
service.desc: MSI는 고객을 우리 가족의 소중한 일원으로 여기며, 최고의 서비스로 고객만족을 최우선으로 합니다. 고객사의 기쁨이 우리에게 가장 큰 보상이며, 여러분의 삶에 가치를 더하는 것이 MSI의 목표입니다. MSI와 함께 진정성이 담긴 진심 어린 서비스를 경험하실 수 있으며, 편안함과 행복을 보장합니다. 우리는 여러분의 일상을 더 특별하게 만드는 데 전념하고자 합니다.

des.title: Contact Us
des.required: Consent for Collection and Use of Personal Information (Required)
